subject: Career
title: White Space and Visual Hierarchy
description: One-minute skill: White Space and Visual Hierarchy.

hook.text: A wall of text triggers an instant 'no.' Recruiters need breathing room to scan.

buildup.text: Visual hierarchy guides the eye: headings, bold titles, and consistent spacing create order.

discovery.text: White space isn't wasted space. It signals confidence and makes key details pop.

twist.text: Cramming more content backfires. When everything fights for attention, nothing wins.

climax.text: The best resumes look effortless because someone spent hours editing down.

punchline.text: Less text, more impact. Let the page breathe.

quiz.question: Why is white space important on a resume?
options: It guides scanning and makes key details pop
